root.title: invest firm cut cyclop cyl stake
root.body: group affili new york invest firm say low stake cyclop corp 260,500 share 6.4 pct total outstand common stock 370,500 share 9.2 pct file secur exchang commiss group lead mutual share corp say sell 110,000 cyclop common share feb 17 19 10.0 mln dlr
